title: Trump approval is low, a new poll shows. Here's who's pulling away
description: The latest NPR/PBS News/Marist poll shows what Americans think of President Trump and his policies.
content: The latest NPR/PBS News/Marist poll shows what Americans think of President Trump and his policies.
